channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 4 Bollard lights in Little Bornes footpath not working, some have been out for several months., 27th August
item.description:
A) 1 x Bollard light not working on footpath in front of No 35 Little Bornes. b) 1 x Bollard light not working on footpath close to front of No 15 Little Bornes. c) 2 x Bollard lights not working on footpath in Little Bornes leading from Alleyn Park to front of No 29.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Little Bornes, Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds, 27th August
item.description:
Good evening On the 14 August, I reported the weeds in our street, Merlin Grove, Beckenham, Kent BR3 3HR. The beginning of our street from the Stanhope Road end looks disgusting, the weeds are very tall. Please can the whole of our street be cleared up of weeds, many thanks. By the way, thank you for fixing the sink hole in Merlin Grove. Kind regards Carol Barnard
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Merlin Grove, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tarpaulin on roadside - A206, 27th August
item.description:
Large blue tarpaulin caught on fence but could be dangerous if it comes loose and ends up on road. Northbound side heading for Blackwall tunnel just near exit for Woolwich (position is parallel to side road).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blackwall Tunnel Approach, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I tripped over this uneven paving stone and cut all my leg. This is a trip hazard for residents and elderly people Hackney Council get this fixed or I will sue you. Location of problem outside 22 Daintry way E9 5JJ now can you get this fixed., 27th August
item.description:
Trip hazard location outside property 22 Daintry way E9

item.title: Sinking/raised paving slabs outside 12 Austral Close., 27th August
item.description:
This unevenness has grown worse over the months. Now significant raises and dips. Residents over eighty and recovering after knee surgery. Also, children and others elders pass this way. Manhole cover adjacent.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Austral Close, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: All drains on Baker's Mews smell very bad!, 27th August
item.description:
The drains in Baker's Mews are giving off an extremely foul odour which is entering the air intake of 10 Portman Square and affecting every tenanted floors which is causing huge business disruption where staff are feeling nauseous and are being sent home. This has generated numerous complaints which is very difficult to manage and will escalate if not resolved ASAP. Could you please clean these drains ASAP and conduct this every 3 months. This issue has been on-going for over many years.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Baker's Mews, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet
